title: Face Recognition Self  Check-In System V.2
description: PT Angkasa Pura I (Persero) requires an integrated, organized, and important system for the purposes of Face Recognition Self Check-In System. With this system, it is hoped that it will facilitate the self-check-in process at the airport and continue with verification processes in Security Check Point and Boarding Gate based on face verification.
short_description: Face recognition is used at the airport for users to self check-in via the Kiosk-K located at the airport.

goals.description:
A program that focuses on making the check-in process more efficient based on facial recognition technology to minimize human staff

Face Recognition Self Check-In System PT Angkasa Pura I (Persero) has purposes as follows:
items: Integrated with Garuda Indonesia system for automated check-in using API integration method (API provided by Garuda)
Integrated with e-KTP Database by using Sam Card registered at DUKCAPIL
Integrated with printer to print Boarding Pass
Integrated with email server as the platform to send e-Boarding Pass
